name: Space Blitz by Terry Hess
description:
2D Space Shooter made with Unity. Scripted game with C# and every action in game is result of scripting. Month long project at Full Sail University.

Controls

Move: w,a,s,d or arrow key

Single Shot: left mouse

Multiple Shot: m

Turbo: t

Cheat Menu: 0

Pause Menu: p

Special Shots: 1, 2, and 3 keys
